projects: [{"title":"Effective magnetic loading on waste cigarette filter derived hydrochar for aqueous phase removal of antibiotics.","start_date":"Apr 2022","end_date":"Apr 2023","description":"- Synthesized composites for the removal of antibiotics like Oxytetracycline and Ciprofloxacin from contaminated water.- Evaluated the physico-chemical properties of the synthesized composites using XRD analysis, VSM analysis, Raman spectroscopy, and SEM-EDAX analysis.- Assessment of the antibiotic removal capacity of the synthesized composites from wastewater was done."}]
